subclusters.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Damage and Antioxidant Defense Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Damage and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory broadly covers ROS production, antioxidant defenses, repair mechanisms, and hormesis as general drivers of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metallothionein-Mediated Oxidative Stress Protection Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses specifically on metallothioneins as antioxidants regulating zinc homeostasis and protecting against ROS, influencing lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Stress and Mitohormesis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on mitochondrial ROS as signaling molecules triggering adaptive stress responses and hormesis that extend lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidation-Inflammation (Oxi-Inflamm-Aging) Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates oxidative stress with chronic inflammation and immune system dysregulation as drivers of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Stress Signaling in Cardiac Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS-induced activation of stress signaling pathways specifically in cardiac tissue leading to myocardial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Damage and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes free radical damage and enhancement of antioxidant defenses as mechanisms slowing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Skeletal Muscle ROS Dysregulation and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details ROS generation, impaired adaptive responses, and mitochondrial ROS effects specifically in skeletal muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress causing molecular damage and functional decline in mesenchymal stem cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neurodegeneration-Linked Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links environmental oxidative stress and impaired antioxidant defense to neurodegenerative aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS production, oxidative damage accumulation, and antioxidant imbalance as aging drivers.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Yeast Oxidative Stress and Aging Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Studies ROS production, oxidative stress responses, and aging mechanisms in yeast as a model organism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxygen Level and Oxidative Stress-Driven Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxygen concentration effects on ROS, DNA damage-induced senescence, and metabolic rate influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Skeletal Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details oxidative stress effects on osteocytes, autophagy failure, and bone fragility as mechanisms of skeletal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Overexpression and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Examines roles and limitations of antioxidant enzymes like SOD and catalase in mitigating oxidative damage and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Antioxidant Defense and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial MnSOD activity, oxidative damage, and their causal role in aging and cancer incidence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: ROS Accumulation and Muscle Regeneration Defect Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes how ROS accumulation impairs muscle regeneration, neuromuscular junction integrity, and repair in aging muscle.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS and Genetic Modulation of Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ETC as ROS source, genetic mutations affecting ROS, and antioxidant defenses modulating lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Brain Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Deficiency Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights oxidative damage and suboptimal antioxidant defense in brain aging and cognitive decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SKN-1/Nrf-Mediated Stress Response and Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SKN-1/Nrf transcription factor regulating antioxidant defense, detoxification, and longevity pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lipid Peroxidation and Neuronal Excitability Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes lipid peroxidation-induced oxidative damage impairing neuronal membrane excitability and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Chronic Inflammation (Inflammaging) Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates oxidative injury with chronic inflammation and dysregulated gene expression as fundamental aging drivers.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxygen Concentration and ROS-Dependent Aging Rate Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes oxygen levels modulate ROS production and antioxidant defense, influencing aging rate and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Free Radical and Circulating Antioxidants Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on free radical damage and circulating antioxidants as determinants of biological aging rate.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: ROS Signaling and Redox Regulation Failure in Muscle Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details ROS as signaling molecules in muscle adaptation and failure of redox regulation causing muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Damage and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accumulation of oxidative damage and decline in antioxidant defenses as general aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Skeletal Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS accumulation, osteoblast/osteocyte dysfunction, and signaling interference in bone aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: OXR1-Mediated Oxidative Stress Protection and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights OXR1 protein's role in oxidative stress defense and lifespan regulation in C. elegans.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress Feedback Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes ROS/RNS accumulation, mitochondrial dysfunction, and redox imbalance driving aging and diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial DNA Damage and ROS Vicious Cycle Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS-induced mtDNA mutations and self-amplifying damage cycle contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress triggering cellular senescence and SASP, promoting tissue dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Phase 2 Protein Induction and Nrf2-Mediated Antioxidant Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on Nrf2 activation inducing phase 2 proteins that counteract oxidative stress and promote healthy aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: MsrA-Catalytic Antioxidant Defense and Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights MsrA enzyme repairing oxidized methionine and catalyzing antioxidant reactions to extend lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: ROS Network Robustness Breakdown and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes aging as breakdown of ROS network robustness with feedback loops and identifies molecular aging targets.
